name: Sensitive personal information
text: A consumer's social security number or driver's license number.

name: Commercial information
text: Records of personal property or products or services purchased.

name: Sale
text: Selling or renting personal information to a third party for valuable consideration.

name: Sharing
text: Communicating personal information to a third party for cross-context behavioral advertising.

name: Right to Opt-Out of Sale or Sharing
text: A consumer has the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of personal information.

name: Right to Limit Use of Sensitive Personal Information
text: A consumer has the right to limit the use of sensitive personal information.
